intro_text: Your patrol catches scent of a mouse nearby.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c locates the mouse and begins to stalk. The mouse nibbles on a seed, unaware of the hunting cat. r_c waggles their haunches and leaps, pinning the mouse beneath a paw as they make the killing bite.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c pinpoints the location of the prey and begins creeping forward. They're almost within pouncing distance when the mouse suddenly bolts. With a lash of their tail, r_c leaps after the mouse, barely snagging it before it reaches a burrow. They purr in satisfaction as prey-blood hits their tongue.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the mouse.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a mouse.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c pounces on the mouse, with a squeak of surprise from both prey and apprentice.
success_text.unscathed_rare: app1 leaps onto the mouse, an easy kill! They're really getting the hang of hunting!

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the mouse.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a large rat.

success_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol catches the rat! More fresh-kill!
success_text.unscathed_rare: The rat rears up and hisses at r_c, but while it's distracted, p_l takes it out with a quick strike.
success_text.stat_skill: The rat is huge and quick, but s_c is quicker, bringing it down just before it scurries out of reach. Everyone gathers around them in congratulations of the skillful kill.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol misses the rat, and their confidence is shaken.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a large hare.

success_text.stat_skill: s_c runs the hare down in a huge display of athleticism and skill.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the hare.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a bird that's occupied scratching at the ground for insects.

success_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol catches the bird before it flies away!
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c creeps towards the bird, setting {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} paws down gently. The bird notices the cat sneaking towards it and attempts to take off. r_c bounds forward and smacks the bird to the ground with an outstretched paw. Outstanding!

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the bird.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a squirrel. It's engrossed in nibbling at a morsel beneath a tree.

success_text.unscathed_common: Stealthily, r_c stalks forward. The squirrel has no idea what's coming as the cat pounces on it and breaks its neck. r_c sends a silent thanks to StarClan for this prey.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c rapidly pads towards the squirrel, their tailtip twitching in excitement. The squirrel is alerted to their presence with a bird's alarm call, but r_c launches themself forward and cuts off its escape with a bite to the back of the head.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the squirrel as it's alerted by a bird's alarm call.

intro_text: Your patrol glimpses the shadow of a fish as they pad past a stream.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c very carefully walks to the water's edge and waits for their chance. When the fish is near, they hook it out of the water with their claws. More fresh-kill!
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c pads closer to the water's edge, careful to keep their shadow away from the water. The fish doesn't seem to notice them and darts too close. r_c's paw flashes into the water and the fish flops onto the bank. r_c kills it and happily carries it back to camp.

fail_text.unscathed_common: The patrol moves too suddenly. The flickering shadow causes the fish to quickly vanish into murkier water.

intro_text: Your patrol sees the shadow of a school of fish in the river.

success_text.unscathed_common: p_l leads a successful fishing session, with almost everyone walking home with a fishy mouthful.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c makes fishing look easy, giving out tips to any interested cats.

fail_text.unscathed_common: The patrol moves too suddenly. The flickering shadow causes the fish to quickly vanish into murkier water.

intro_text: r_c spots a rabbit up ahead but it seems to be acting strange. The patrol can see its tremors from a few fox-lengths away.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c catches the rabbit and it is eaten as normal.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c catches the rabbit, but when they report about the strange incident at camp, the dead rabbit is taken far away and buried.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c stops the patrol from catching the rabbit and takes the opportunity to teach them about illnesses that can pass from prey to cat.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c leaps for the rabbit but it still manages to slip away, despite its obvious illness.
fail_text.injury: r_c catches the rabbit, but later they and the cats who eat it become violently ill.

decline_text: r_c avoids catching the rabbit and looks for other prey.

intro_text: A rabbit bursts out from cover, startled by the patrol.
decline_text: They watch it go, just as startled.

success_text.unscathed_common: The patrol rallies almost instantly, and manages to corner and catch the rabbit!
success_text.stat_skill: s_c reacts quickly, tearing off after the rabbit and slamming a paw on its head to bring it down.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol jumps after it, but the rabbit has too great of a head start.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c is quicker than anyone else, tearing after the rabbit, but in their haste they put a paw wrong and stop as a sharp twinge of pain shoots up {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} leg.

intro_text: As the patrol spreads out to hunt, r_c admits they think they had a vision from StarClan last night.
decline_text: The patrol doesn't talk about the vision.

success_text.unscathed_common: The patrol talks to them about whether it was a real vision as they hunt.
success_text.unscathed_rare: p_l takes r_c aside, giving them the full benefits of p_l's seniority and experience as they discuss r_c's vision.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c chooses to hunt with r_c, the spiritual warrior gently guiding the conversation. r_c feels deeply privileged and far more at peace after confiding in them.

fail_text.unscathed_common: No one can make sense of the vision.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: r_c notices p_l looking at them enviously, withdraws from the rest of the patrol, and dismisses the dream as unimportant.

intro_text: As {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} head out to hunt, r_c thinks about the dream {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} had last night... was it sent by StarClan?

success_text.unscathed_common: It definitely distracts {PRONOUN/r_c/object} from the hunt, but r_c uses the time by {PRONOUN/r_c/self} to put {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} thoughts in order. It was a sign from {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} ancestors. Now {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} need to figure out what to do next.
success_text.unscathed_rare: Somehow hunting brings r_c to almost a meditative state, and not only are {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} fairly confident of their next steps having been given this vision, but {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} also bring back a good haul to the prey pile.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c often feels like StarClan walks with them, and this is just another instance on the path. They use the solo patrol to collect their thoughts, and by the time {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/pad/pads} home with a good catch, {PRONOUN/s_c/subject}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} ready for the next step {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} vision hinted at.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c can't make sense of the vision.

intro_text: r_c is tempted to eat the prey they just caught.
decline_text: r_c decides against breaking the warrior code

success_text.unscathed_common: They resist the temptation, going on to make a couple of great catches to make sure the elders are fed.
success_text.unscathed_rare: After all, they have caught enough on this solo hunt that they won't be able to carry it all back to camp. They stop for a quick snack and return to camp laden with prey for the fresh-kill pile.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c gives in to their grumbling belly, reasoning that no one will notice, but when they arrive back at camp empty-pawed and with blood on their lips they feel the stares of the other warriors on their pelt.

intro_text: r_c is tempted to eat the prey they just caught.
decline_text: r_c decides against breaking the warrior code

success_text.unscathed_common: They resist the temptation, going on to make a couple of great catches to make sure the elders are fed.
success_text.unscathed_rare: After all, they have caught enough on this solo hunt that they won't be able to carry it all back to camp. They stop for a quick snack and return to camp laden with prey for the fresh-kill pile.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c gives in to their grumbling belly, reasoning that no one will notice, but when they arrive back at camp empty-pawed and with blood on their lips they feel the stares of the warriors on their pelt. r_c slinks back to the apprentice's den, tail and ears low.

intro_text: r_c is tempted to eat the prey they just caught.
decline_text: r_c decides against breaking the warrior code

success_text.unscathed_common: They resist the temptation, going on to make a couple of great catches to make sure the elders are fed.
success_text.unscathed_rare: After all, the patrol has caught enough on this hunt that they'll have trouble carrying it all back to camp. They stop for a quick snack and return to camp laden with prey for the fresh-kill pile.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c gives in to their grumbling belly, reasoning that no one will notice, but when the patrol reforms and r_c arrives back empty-pawed with blood on their lips they feel the suspicious stares of the other warriors on their pelt.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/s_c/think/thinks} {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/r_c/'ve/'s} gotten away with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} clandestine snacking, but when r_c arrives back at camp, another patrol member pulls the deputy aside for a quiet word, glaring back at r_c. The deputy assigns {PRONOUN/r_c/object} to dig a new trench for the Clan's dirtplace, and r_c hears snide remarks when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} slink in to {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} nest that night.

intro_text: r_c is tempted to eat the prey they just caught.
decline_text: r_c decides against breaking the warrior code

success_text.unscathed_common: They eat the prey without anyone noticing.
success_text.unscathed_rare: After all, the patrol has caught enough on this hunt that they'll have trouble carrying it all back to camp. They stop for a quick snack and return to camp laden with prey for the fresh-kill pile.

fail_text.unscathed_common: They think they've gotten away with their clandestine snacking, but when r_c arrives back at camp, another patrol member pulls the deputy aside for a quiet word, glaring back at r_c. The deputy assigns them to dig a new trench for the Clan's dirtplace; r_c prickles with humiliation and terrible smells.
